text: Egh gumazim Krais Iesus ko ikɨtɨ, eghtɨ arazir gumazibar mɨkarzir mogomem aghorim, a pura bizim, egh arazir gumazibar mɨkarzir mogomem aghorir puvatɨzim, a uaghan pura bizim. Ezɨma gumazir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim itim, an nɨghnɨzir gavgavim a gamima, a bar gumazir igharazibagh ifonge, ezɨ kar guizbangɨn bizim. Godɨn Duamɨn gavgavimɨn, e nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn iti. Egha e, dughiar God suam, ia nan damazimɨn derazim, e a mɨzuai.
